NewsItem.HEADLINE: LPWA 2018 Forecast Update 1 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF File)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Updated five-year forecast for LoRa, LTE-M, NB-IoT and other LPWA devices
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This updated forecast provides a summary Excel sheet for the latest forecast along with a one-page set of research notes, outlining the changes over the past six months.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Cat-M LTE-M NB-ioT 5G URLLC Sigfox LoRa RPMA Ingenu Telensa UNB
